featured.text: While it is generally taken as an indicator of their marital status, the practice is primarily related to the Hindu religion.

definition.zh_def: 宗教是一套信仰和實踐，通常涉及對超自然力量或神靈的崇拜。
definition.en_def: Religion is a system of beliefs and practices, often involving the worship of a supernatural power or deity.
definition.example: Many people find comfort and community in their religion.
